name: DUNGEON SMASHER
description:
This is my submission for Ludum Dare #48 - "Deeper and Deeper"

ARROW KEYS TO MOVE.
UP ARROW = SUPER FLYING
DOWN ARROW (from air) = MEGA SLAM (hold for aftershock powerbomb)
SPACE BAR = Jump and Wall-Jump

M key to Mute music
-------------
This game has no ending. ✌️ Just have fun smashing through the bricks for a few minutes!
